frozen.name: lzo
frozen.shortDescription: A data compresion library suitable for real-time data de-/compression
frozen.longDescription:
LZO is a data compression library which is suitable for data
	 de-/compression in real-time.  This means it favours speed over
	 compression ratio.

	 LZO is written in ANSI C.  Both the source code and the compressed
	 data format are designed to be portable across platforms.
